price: 6. I dhaxla4, dhaxlana reer Yacquub oo ka yeel Rabbiyow midaad ka raalli tahay.
arabic: يَرِثُنِي وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَۖ وَٱجۡعَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيّٗا
footnotes: 4. Iga dhaxla cilmiga diinta iyo Nabinnimada ee loola ma jeedo maalka, waayo anbiyadu lagama dhaxlo maal adduunyo, waxay ka tagaan oo maal ahna waa sadaqo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yarithunī wayarithu min āli yaʿqūba wa-ij'ʿalhu rabbi raḍiyyan
